SELECT LOG_IDX , DATE_FORMAT(LOG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as LOG_DT , LOG_ID , LOG_COUNTRY , LOG_TIMEZONE , LOG_TELGRM , LOG_USE , DATE_FORMAT(LOG_EXP, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as LOG_EXP FROM CONNECT_LOG WHERE 1=1
AND (LOG_DT BETWEEN '${startDt}' AND DATE_ADD('${endDt}', INTERVAL 1 DAY))
AND LOG_ID LIKE '${searchText}'
AND LOG_TELGRM LIKE '${searchText}'
AND (LOG_ID LIKE '${searchText}' or LOG_TELGRM LIKE '${searchText}')
ORDER BY LOG_IDX DESC
LIMIT ${scopeRow}, ${rowCount}
